meta.description: Maximize the flow of goods from City 0 to City 5 in a transportation network with capacity constraints.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: Set of cities in the transportation network.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Maximum capacity of goods that can be transported between cities per day in thousands of tons.

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Flow of goods between cities in thousands of tons.

vars.name: F
vars.description: Total flow of goods from City 0 to City 5 in thousands of tons.

objective.name: maximize_total_flow
objective.description: Maximize the total flow of goods from City 0 to City 5.

constraints.name: source_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the source city (City 0).

constraints.name: sink_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the sink city (City 5).

constraints.name: intermediate_flow_balance_1
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate city (City 1).

constraints.name: intermediate_flow_balance_2
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate city (City 2).

constraints.name: intermediate_flow_balance_3
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate city (City 3).

constraints.name: intermediate_flow_balance_4
constraints.description: Flow conservation at intermediate city (City 4).

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_1
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from City 0 to City 1.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_2
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from City 0 to City 2.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_3
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from City 0 to City 3.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_4
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from City 0 to City 4.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from City 0 to City 5.

constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from City 2 to City 4.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_2_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint for flow from City 2 to City 5.
